quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Success is doing what you want, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy
quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, be.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.quote: This above all: to thine own self be true.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

quotes.author: Buddha
quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
quotes.quote: Don't count the days; make the days count.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.author: Coco Chanel
quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't -- you're right.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.author: Coco Chanel
quotes.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: If you have only one smile in you, give it to the people you love.

quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy
quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.

quotes.author: Stephen Covey
quotes.quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
Love is not about how many days, months, or years you've been together. It's all about how much you love each other every day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: In the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.quote: Love is a promise. Love is a souvenir. Once given, never forgotten. Never let it disappear.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both can win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: You don't marry someone you can live with – you marry the person you cannot live without.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is not what you say. Love is what you do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls a man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the gods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: A true lover always feels in debt to the one he loves.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the only gold.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest thing in this world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Love is the enchanted dawn of every heart.
quotes.author: Lamartine

quotes.quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times and within the reach of every hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the gods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your heart or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Be yourself : everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't compromise yourself - you're all you have.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is taken.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Just be yourself, there is no one better.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Authenticity is the daily practice of letting go of who we think we're supposed to be and embracing who we are.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: You were born an original, don't die a copy.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. It's about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
